name: Manual Dark Mode
description: Aplica modo escuro em paginas que nao o suportam nativamente
content_security_policy: script-src 'self' https://www.gstatic.com/ https://*.firebaseio.com https://www.googleapis.com; object-src 'self'; connect-src 'self' wss://*.firebaseio.com https://firestore.googleapis.com/;
